Location cost staff free shuttle within 3 miles restaurant outside sitting areas Close to shopping restaurants movies
Ultimately this is an older hotel that needs renovated but was not worth the money paid
Good food which comes with expensive price tag
I would not stay at this hotel again due to the substandard quality of hotel but the price was good which should have provoked us to look into it more and read other reviews

So this hotel which is absolutely acceptable gets four stars from me because the room was clean the water pressure was good the bar had a good selection and the breakfast though a little pricey at 12 was varied and tasty
Decent hotel for the price met our budget
The breakfast was worth the price with all the great options
But when I laid in the bed I understood the discounted rate
1: Breakfast is available but there is a charge

On top of the room smelling like mildew towels not being replaced and the bathroom door getting stuck so you had to practically throw your body at it to get out after I checked out of the hotel the hotel charged my credit card a month later because they lost my tax exempt forms they were given when I checked into the hotel
The hotel is undergoing renovations which explains why it was priced afordably
I was told by Hilton Garden when I called that I did not need to pay anything else
If you want food be prepared to pay a pretty penny for standard hotel fare
